titleStmt.title: Choice presidents upon all Acts of Parliament relating to the office and duty of a justice of peace. With necessary notes and instructions thereupon taken out of the said Acts of Parliament, and other particular cases in law adjudg'd therein. As also a more useful method of making up Court-Rolls than hath been hitherto known or published in print. By Rich. Kilburne, Esq; late one of His Majestie's Justices of the Peace for the county of Kent, and principal of Staple-Inn.
titleStmt.author: Kilburne, Richard, 1605-1678.
G. F., of Grayes-Inn.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with many usefull additions. Made publick by G.F. of Grayes-Inn, Esq;.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of Rich. and Edw. Atkins, Esquires, for Richard Tonson within Grayes-Inn-Gate next Grayes-Inn-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
